name: Mini Design System - @ux.edward
description:
Hey everyone,

As promised, I have decided to giveaway my mini-design system for you all to use. So this file includes a mini-design system of color and typography, in hopes to inspire you to create something better.


P.S. I added an Auto-layout tutorial just for you to learn from!


Hope it helps you!


Lots of love x

Ed @ux.edward
